actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to discourage the prevention of the marketing of certain patented means for energy conservation.

summary.text: Modifies the patent laws concerning energy conserving technology. Waives patent protection where such patent is not held by the inventor, and the rights thereto have not been exercised at any time during the five-year period beginning with the first transfer for valuable consideration of the patent to one who is not the inventor.

titles.title: A bill to discourage the prevention of the marketing of certain patented means for energy conservation.
